description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 23/03426/FUL: verification report (25) in respect of redevelopment of the site involving demolition of all existing buildings/ structures with the erection of a building for B2 general industrial, B8 storage and distribution, and E(g)(iii) light industrial purposes with ancillary offices, together with associated car parking, servicing and landscape planting (revised scheme following withdrawal).
decision_conditions: The proposal fails to include the 0.04ha green roof, as stated in the Ecological Impact Assessment, in the verification report. The application is therefore not in accordance with policies G6 of the London Plan (2021), policy CP36 of the Core Strategy (2010) and policies DMD78 and DMD79 of the Development Management Document (2014).
